Package model

Interface Board

All Known Implementing Classes:
TicTacToeBoard
public interface Board
This is an interface for a Tic-Tac-Toe board. It defines the methods and constants for a Tic-Tac-Toe board.

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    static final int
    BOARD_COLS
    Number of columns on Tic-Tac-Toe board.
    static final int
    BOARD_ROWS
    Number of rows on Tic-Tac-Toe board.
    static final char
    EMPTY
    Symbol for an empty tile on the Tic-Tac-Toe board.
    static final char
    O_SYMBOL
    One of two playable symbols.
    static final char
    X_SYMBOL
    One of two playable symbols.

    • isComputerPlayer

      boolean isComputerPlayer(Player player)
      Return whether or not the specified player is a computer player or not.
      Parameters:

      Returns:
      True if the player is a computer player, false otherwise.
